#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,x=0,s=0,c=0;
   
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        s=0,c=0;
         char a[100000],p;
        cin>>a;
        for(int i=0;a[i]!='\0';i++){
            x=a[i];
            s=s+x;c++;
        }
        s=s/c;
        p=s;
        cout<<p<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
